# Syntax Highlighting

This example shows some syntax highlighting:

```html
<div class="wrap">
    <button class="button" type="button" data-ng-click="openSomething()">Test</button>
</div>
```

```less
.wrap {
    display: block;

    .button {
        background-color: red;
    }
}
```

```js
function openSomething() {
    console.log('I\'m going to open something... yay!!!');
}
```
